DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to monitor adverse events in HIV-infected children <18 years old who are exposed to Atazanavir in a real-world setting in Europe.
DOC.brief_title: Post-marketing Safety Surveillance Program in Human Immunodeficiency Virus (HIV)-Infected Children Exposed to Atazanavir in Europe
DOC.criteria: HIVinfected children participating in individual prospective paediatric HIV cohorts Receive Atazanavir treatment during 01JAN2011 to 30DEC2013 Age <18 years old on the date starting an Atazanavircontaining regimen Have a minimum of 3 months of followup
